name: MA Wills & Trusts in plain English
content: Lexington attorney Joel Bernstein is an estate attorney known for his 'plain English' approach to the topic. He's addresses audiences on both the West and East coasts and was the former columnist for the American Bar Association. He's also mentioned in the national treatise Loring and Rounds: A Trustee's Handbook. Joel has studied with leading law practitioners in California and has addressed audiences, both public and professional, in all the New England states and across the U.S. on all facets of estate planning and income taxation of trusts and estates. Since 1992, he's created more than 2,700 wills and trusts, all the while using "plain English," to his clients' delight.
